answers.answer: Hi, understand your anxiety. Metabolic disorders like diabetes and hypertension are controlled with medications and life style measures. Successful therapy requires lifelong commitment. It involves monitoring blood sugar levels, leading a healthy life style and working towards preventing any serious complications that may be caused due to diabetes. As he is on dialysis, he needs to be monitored and if it progresses he may need renal transplant. Good Luck with his care. Regards.
